channel.title: [Forum Suggestion] Required Base Input?
channel.description:
I enjoy helping people in the Server Help and Client Help sections, but 40% of my posts are "What base is this...?" because they do not post the base. (Project Insanity, Delta, Etc.)
I believe there should be some kind of rule to save the time of people that are willing to help.
Because I would be helping someone (I focus on PI), and after 20 minutes they FINALLY say, "Oh, it's Delta btw."....

item.title: [Forum Suggestion] Required Base Input?

item.description:
@krackkid wrote:
